value.fullName: The case has been settled and plaintiff has received the full settlement amount
value.label: The case has been settled and plaintiff has received the full settlement amount

value.fullName: An Acknowledgment of Full Satisfaction of Judgment has been filed and entered by the court
value.label: An Acknowledgment of Full Satisfaction of Judgment has been filed and entered by the court

value.fullName: Judgment entered for the plaintiff who chose to pursue collection of judgment on his/her own behalf (see Reassignment of Claim)
value.label: Judgment entered for the plaintiff who chose to pursue collection of judgment on his/her own behalf (see Reassignment of Claim)

value.fullName: Judgment for the plaintiff but no known bank assets for defendant employer
value.label: Judgment for the plaintiff but no known bank assets for defendant employer

value.fullName: Judgment in plaintiff’s favor has been partially satisfied. No other known assets of the defendant
value.label: Judgment in plaintiff’s favor has been partially satisfied. No other known assets of the defendant

value.fullName: Defendant’s appeal has been dismissed. Request is hereby made for district office to enter judgment on underlying ODA and record Certificate of lien
value.label: Defendant’s appeal has been dismissed. Request is hereby made for district office to enter judgment on underlying ODA and record Certificate of lien
